vAuto Sales Process Workshop - Atlanta Please join us on Thursday, February 12 in Atlanta, GA when Tom Murphy, Director of Performance Management, will conduct a Sales Process Workshop.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for Sales Associates, Sales Management and BDC Staff.
Workshop Overview:
vAuto recognizes that the Internet isn’t a part of the used car business… it is the used car business. With 92% of car shoppers conducting their research online and the average customer only visiting 1.75 dealerships before purchasing, vAuto has customized this training course to introduce a new Internet-driven sales process.
- Review of traditional sales processes and their limitations given the dynamics of today’s Internet-driven marketplace - Identification of tools for communicating transparency and credibility when using market pricing - Training activities designed to help you effectively answer the most common objections without sacrificing margin
Location: Atlanta Marriott Century Center/Emory Area 2000 Century Boulevard NE Atlanta, GA 30345 (404) 325-0000
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register <http://go.vauto.com/Atlanta-Workshop-2122015.html> your attendees by February 5th. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email.
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Atlanta Marriott Century Center/Emory Area, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/atlne-atlanta-marriott-century-center-emory-area/> or call the hotel directly at (404) 325-0000.
We hope to see you there! -vAuto Marketing vAuto, Inc., 1901 S. Meyers Road, Suite 700, Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181
